item.title: CVE-2021-20779|2024-08-03T17:53:22.371Z -- codemiq -- wordpress%20email%20template%20designer%20-%20wp%20html%20mail
item.description: Cross-site request forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in WordPress Email Template Designer - WP HTML Mail versions prior to 3.0.8 allows remote attackers to hijack the authentication of administrators via unspecified vectors.
